long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2048 Cupcakes is a free extension that allows you to play the classic puzzle game 2048 with a cupcake theme. The extension is simple to use: just install it from the Chrome Web Store and you'll be able to play 2048 Cupcakes in any tab.

2048 is a game where you merge tiles to create a tile with the number 2048. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, and it's perfect for playing in short bursts.

2048 Cupcakes adds a cupcake theme to the game, with cupcakes on the tiles and cupcake sounds effects. This makes the game more fun and challenging, and it's sure to appeal to fans of cupcakes.

With 2048 Cupcakes, you can now enjoy the classic game of 2048 with a fun and challenging twist. So what are you waiting for? Download 2048 Cupcakes today and start merging!

Play more games on the top-left menu.
